actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil Service and General Services.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from Office of Personnel Management; GAO; Transportation Department.
Committee on Governmental Affairs received executive comment from GAO.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service, Post Office, and General Services

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code, to promote public safety by encouraging the employment of highly qualified systems specialists by establishing a salary compensation system commensurate with skill and responsibility, by establishing a special retirement plan, and for other purposes.
short_title: Airways Facilities Systems Specialists Act of 1981

summary.text: Airways Facilities Systems Specialists Act of 1981 - Establishes the position of "airways facilities systems specialist" within the Airways Facilities Division of the Federal Aviation Administration, Department of Transportation. Sets forth wage classifications, retirement plans, and a career progression program for such systems specialists.

titles.title: Airways Facilities Systems Specialists Act of 1981

A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code, to promote public safety by encouraging the employment of highly qualified systems specialists by establishing a salary compensation system commensurate with skill and responsibility, by establishing a special retirement plan, and for other purposes.
